items.title: Nvidia supplier SK Hynix to boost spending on AI chips, after record Q2
items.summary: Nvidia supplier SK Hynix plans to boost spending on AI chips following a record Q2, driven by strong AI chip demand and customer stockpiling amid potential U.S. tariffs.
